TrustyJAID
description: Log changes within the server using extended modlogs, an extension of RedBot cores modlog.
install_msg: Please ensure that the modlog cog is loaded for this cog to work. The channel is set via `[p]modlogset modlog #channel`.
name: ExtendedModLog
short: ExtendedModLog, track changes made in the server.
